item.title: Vote for the Cuomo: It’s important

item.description: Campus autonomy was a major driver of the can-do America that Trump aims to revive.

item.title: Erie Canal, here’s to your 200th. Thanks for transforming America.
item.description: The canal’s 363 miles, dug by human muscle, aided by improvised cleverness, helped build a nation.
